list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the devotion of time and attention to acquiring knowledge on an academic subject, especially by means of books.
a detailed investigation and analysis of a subject or situation.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a study of a sample of 5,000 children
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một nghiên cứu về một mẫu 5.000 trẻ em

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a room used or designed for reading, writing, or academic work.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the third bedroom was used as a study
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Phòng ngủ thứ ba được sử dụng như một nghiên cứu

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a piece of work, especially a drawing, done for practice or as an experiment.
a thing or person that is an embodiment or good example of something.
devote time and attention to acquiring knowledge on (an academic subject), especially by means of books.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô học sinh và thực vật học

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: look at closely in order to observe or read.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she bent her head to study the plans
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô cúi đầu học kế hoạch

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: make an effort to achieve (a result) or take into account (a person or their wishes).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: with no husband to study, housekeeping is mere play
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: không có chồng học, vệ sinh chỉ chơi
